DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Graft Prior Infusion Procedure Cryopreservation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body._Earlier in time or order._A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion._Preservation of cells, tissues, organs, or embryos by storage at low temperatures.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify portion of cells cryo
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify portion of cells cryopreserved prior to infusion

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:3050012
ReferenceDocuments.description: Biologic [cells] > Subject > PerformedObservation > PerformedObservationResult.value(ANY=>PQ)  WHERE PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "measure volume" AND Biologic > Subject > PerformedMaterialProcessStep > DefinedMaterialProcessStep.nameCode = "Perform Cryopreservation" AND Biologic > Subject > PerformedSubstanceAdministration [infusion] AND  DefinedObservation > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND DefinedMaterialProcessStep > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND DefinedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [measure] IS LESS THAN DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [cryopreservation] IS LESS THAN DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [infusion]
